content: Man the fortress  ramparts, watch the road;
Strengthen your back [prepare for battle], summon all your strength.
For the  will restore the splendor  majesty of Jacob
Like the splendor of [ancient and united] Israel,
Even though destroyers have destroyed them

“Behold, I am against you [Nineveh],” declares the  of hosts, “and I will burn your chariots in the smoke, and the sword will devour your young lions. I will cut off your prey from the land, and the voice of your messengers will no longer be heard.”
